definitions.definition: A decorative strip around the edge of something.
definitions.example: There's a nice frilly border around the picture frame.

definitions.definition: A strip of ground in which ornamental plants are grown.
The line or frontier area separating political or geographical regions.
definitions.example: The border between Canada and USA is the longest in the world.

definitions.definition: Border morris or border dancing; a vigorous style of traditional English dance originating from villages along the border between England and Wales, performed by a team of dancers usually with their faces disguised with black makeup.
A string that is both a prefix and a suffix of another particular string.
To put a border on something.
To form a border around; to bound.
To lie on, or adjacent to, a border of.
definitions.example: Denmark borders Germany to the south.

definitions.definition: To touch at a border (with on, upon, or with).
To approach; to come near to; to verge (with on or upon).
